## Bundler class

Assists in orchastrating bundle operations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class Bundler extends Transform 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_flush(callback)](./gulp-bundle-assets.bundler._flush.md) |  | Does bundling and pushes resulting files into stream. |
|  [\_transform(chunk, encoding, callback)](./gulp-bundle-assets.bundler._transform.md) |  | Collects copies of applicable files to later bundle. |
